metadataAttributes.title: To the Shareholders of Berkshire Hathaway Inc.
metadataAttributes.summary: This letter from Warren E. Buffett, Chairman of Berkshire Hathaway Inc., discusses various aspects of the company's performance and operations in 2024. Key points include the importance of honest reporting, acknowledgment of mistakes, and the success story of Pete Liegl and Forest River. The letter also covers Berkshire's financial performance, including a record-breaking tax payment, and the company's approach to property-casualty insurance. Additionally, it mentions Berkshire's investments in Japanese companies and plans for the annual meeting in Omaha. The letter concludes with a comparison of Berkshire's performance against the S&P 500 over the years.
